title:
Recall Any Conversation
with active listening.
description: Always ready to hear your voice, it analyzes conversations to be referenced in the future, with the ability to turn on or off.
content1: Ask or write to your buddy to let them know you want to turn on Active Listening, your buddy can listen as much or as little as you want it.
step2: Fine Tune and Customize in Settings
content2: Simply notify your chosen buddy to enable Active Listening, allowing selective or continuous monitoring.
step3: Access to All Conversations in Archive
content3: Retrieve any past conversation from our limitless archive, provided your selected buddy was tuned in. Ideal for transcription or dictation.
sub_content1: Customize listening schedule with Active Listenig wether it’s certain hours, meetings or 24-7 is all up to you.
sub_content2: Record and scrutinize dialogues across various voices indefinitely with our active listening tool.
sub_content3: You can use different buddies of your choice to analyze and listen to your conversations.

title: Streamline with Professional Tools.
description: Professional tools designed with a touch of charm to brighten up your workday help with automating business tasks and general virtual assistance.
step1: Define your Toolset and train your "Staff"
content1: Select from an array of business and professional tool prompts or start training your Buddy right away.
content2: Explain as simple and precisely as you can for the best output. We will automatically decide which AI LLM to use or you can specify your favorite.
content3: Clearly define your automation parameters to ensure that routine tasks are handled optimally. Leverage our charming virtual assistants for smooth operation, letting you focus on more critical aspects of your business.
sub_content1: Integrate our robust set of professional tools to streamline your business operations effortlessly.
sub_content2: Automate routine tasks across various departments, enhancing efficiency and productivity.
sub_content3: Add a touch of charm to your workday with our uniquely designed virtual assistants, plus they won’t forget any training.

title: Unlimited Memory and Personalization.
description: Train and choose from different adorable personality settings, with infinite memory and even team up multiple buddies to collaborate!
step1: Choose an Animal or Create a Team
content1: We use the best AI models to make the most effective and adorable buddies. Plus we are always on the lookout for the latest and greatest integrations and are constantly updating and improving our technology.  They can even work together to complete multiple tasks at once and cross collaborate like a humanish team.
content2: Explain as simple and precisely as you can for the best output. We will automatically decide which AI LLM to use or you can specify your favorite.
content3: The Zoo Buddies are highly trained and get smarter as you teach them and feed them content. Our AI Buddies are highly trained and get smarter as you teach them and feed them content.
